summary: Request to expose a defaultConnection() method that switches between localhost and cloud environments based on an environment variable, enabling easier cloud-based sample execution.
userImpact: Users can more easily run samples in cloud environments without manually switching connection configurations.
proposedFix: Implement a defaultConnection() method that reads TEMPORAL_ADDRESS environment variable to switch between localhost and cloud connections
workaround: Use TEMPORAL_ADDRESS environment variable as implemented in temporal-bridge
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support environment-based connection switching
keyQuote: Expose a defaultConnection() method or similar that switches between localhost (default) and cloud based on some environment variable
